method.step: Wash the toor daal. Add it in pressure cooker pan. Add water to it and cook the daal in pressure cooker for about 20 min (until 3 whistles).
When the cooker cools down, remove the daal and keep aside.
Chop the tomatos finely. Chop the green chilli to make pieces of 1 inch.
Heat the oil in a frying pan and add Asafoetida, mustard seeds and cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add curry leaves and green chilli.
When the curry leaves and chilli change color (from dark green to light green), add turmeric powder.
Heat it for 15 seconds and add the cooked toor daal in it. Add salt and stir it. Let it simmer for 2 min.
Add chopped coriander and the toor daal is ready to serve. (Can serve to about 3 people. It can be consumed along with plain rice)
